title: Tadej Pogačar Obliterates Monte Grappa Strava KoM with 900-Watt Giro d’Italia-Winning Attack
content:
Another stage-win, another Strava blitz for Pogačar, who crushed the 18km Monte Grappa record by more than five minutes on stage 20 of the Giro d'Italia.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar Obliterates Monte Grappa Strava KoM with 900-Watt Giro d’Italia-Winning Attack on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
